Description:
In an era where financial institutions are redefining their edge through innovation, agentic AI is emerging as a game-changer. Join us for a dynamic panel featuring industry leaders as they share how agentic AI is driving excellence across customer experience, operational resilience, and risk intelligence. Explore real-world applications from strategic impact of agentic systems to lessons learned from deployments. Gain insights into whatâ€™s next for AI in financial services.

Chapters: 0:00 - Overview of 'Excellence in Financial Services with Agentic AI' Session 00:08:30 - Transition to Panel Discussion Featuring Global Financial Leaders 00:14:12 - Use of generative and agentic AI in end-to-end banking processes 00:17:47 - OP Bank outlines vision to become an AI-first organization and early successes 00:24:30 - Shift Beyond Traditional Data Center Migrations 00:25:03 - Using AI and Agentic Code Development to Address Technical Debt 00:28:00 - Consolidating Applications and Moving to Cloud Infrastructure 00:34:13 - Introducing Unified Experience Strategy for Members and Employees 00:43:39 - Microsoft Tools, Copilot, and Change Management Importance in AI Transformation
